name: Nature Must Die
description:
Controls:

W A S D to move

Left-click and Right-click to attack

P to pause

Esc to exit to main menu

R to restart level/frame

JamDNA criteria:

Hack and slash: The game is about hacking and slashing you chainsaw inside little cute animals. The combat... is hack and slashy.

Nature: It's all around you, and its also a bit dead after you're done with it

Inertia: Happens when you touch the ice on the ground

Fanfare Music: Every time you win a level, fanfare music comes on

Credits:

JonasMG/Jonas - Game Design

Hephaestu5/Barney - Art

du97y/Josh - Sound Design
